title: Ruby
description: Ruby is a general-purpose, interpreted, object-oriented programming language known for its simple and readable syntax. It is popular for full-stack web development, especially with the Ruby on Rails framework. It is also used for scripting, text processing, and task automation.

items.title: Ruby Tutorial - Tutorialspoint
items.description: Explore tutorials and detailed references for Ruby, covering fundamental concepts, object-oriented programming, blocks and iterators, and much more.

items.title: Ruby on Rails Guides
items.description: Official documentation of Ruby on Rails, a popular framework for full-stack web development in Ruby. Learn how to build complete web applications with Ruby on Rails.

items.title: Learn Ruby the Hard Way
items.description: Learn Ruby through practical exercises and challenges that gradually teach you programming. Ideal for those who prefer an interactive approach.

items.title: Ruby for Beginners - GoRails
items.description: Free online course for beginners in Ruby, offered by the GoRails platform. Learn the basics of the language and fundamental concepts of web development.
